Works great UNLESS you plan on using a controller such as a PS3 controller. Here are some problems with the controller:

Triangle makes the game crash when in a dogfight (no problems scrolling through menus though) and the game may crash after some time even though you don't have to press triangle. Pretty sure this is the maker's fault though
Fix for the controller problem. Make sure (With PS3 controllers and DS3 Tool installed) to switch it to Xbox 360 emulator. Then change it around a little bit and everything works perfect!
@AnonymousSurfer you no0b, try Xpadder or MotionInJoy which are 3rd party software for controllers..
Anyhow it works like a mother fucker, real sweet! THAAANK YAAAW!! +1
